milestones.title: Contributing to Layer5 (a CNCF project) as a Community Manager
milestones.description: The Layer5 community is the most extensive assembly of integrations for cloud-native management. We build projects to provide learning environments, deploy and implement optimal operational strategies, establish performance benchmarks, generate documentation, facilitate networking opportunities, and more. Our collective dedication to the ethos of open source propels the progression of Layer5 projects.
